animeTitle: Boukensha: The Man Was from Spain (Dub)
otherNames: Christopher Columbus: The Commemorative Series, Boukensha: The Man Was from Spain, Christopher Columbus, 冒険者－THE MAN WAS FROM SPAIN－
synopsis:
Christopher Columbus is a man of strong will. His life is full of drama.

Born in Genoa, he realizes his dream of becoming a sailor, dares to search for a new route, and finally reaches his goal, discovering a new land in the process.

Sometimes in desperation, sometimes in excitement, his experiences are truly extraordinary.
